item.title: Court Of Appeal Defers Judgement On Uche Secondus Versus PDP
item.description: The Court of Appeal, sitting in Port-Harcourt, the Rivers State capital, has deferred to Friday, judgement on Uche Secondus’ suit seeking the stoppage of the national convention of the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP. Naija News reports that the suspended National Chairman of the party, Prince Uche Secondus, is seeking the stoppage of the national convention scheduled for 30-31 October, 2021. Secondus had through his attorney approached the Appeal Court to stop the PDP convention.

item.title: Daenerys Targaryen Thinks She Can't Get Pregnant And She Might Be Wrong
Tiny Hand And Feet Manicures Are A Thing And People Are Horrified
item.description: The Internet's latest obsession is manicures that involve tiny little hands and feet. If there's one thing that we've learned over the years, it's that anything is possible when it comes to beauty trends. The Internet's latest obsession is manicures that involve tiny little hands and feet, such as those posted by the Instagram account @nail_sunny, a chain of nail art stores in Russia with over 2 million followers on the social media platform.

item.title: Top 10 adventure movies of all time
item.description: Adventure movies have a special place in everyone’s DVD collection because sometimes you need to engross yourself in a tale of epic proportions. Adventure films can never go out of style and will keep the audience excited with the improvement of graphics. These films transport us to various places and times from regular life to an exciting new world that has diverse possibilities. Some people best define an adventure movie in terms of how well the film illustrates the pursuit of luck and exaltation.

Meet The Married Man Who Sponsors BBNaija's Nengi's Extravagant Lifestyle
item.description: It has been alleged that one Micheal Diongoli ,who is married with kids, is the sponsor and billionaire sugar daddy of former Big Brother Naija Housemate Nengi Rebecca Hampson. Naija News understands that Nengi Hampson, recently acquired a Range Rover Velar worth N40 million and just a few months ago, she bought a mansion in Lagos, leaving fans curious. A controversial Instagram blogger, Gist Lover has now claimed that Nengi’s financier is one Micheal Diongoli.

item.title: Jodi Lyn O'Keefe - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Model and actress who played Don Johnson's character's daughter on Nash Bridges. She has also starred as Lionel Davenport in the VH1 drama Hit the Floor as well as Gretchen Morgan on the series Prison Break. Before Fame She started modeling at the age of eight. She left her junior year of high school to star on the soap opera Another World. Trivia She played Cassidy Bridges on Nash Bridges at age seventeen. She founded a clothing line called Queen George Clothing.

item.title: Nigeria Air Will Be A Game Changer
item.description: The Presidency has said Nigeria Air would be a game changer when it is eventually officially inaugurated despite being impeded by several challenges. Recall that the Minister of Aviation, Hadi Sirika has said the plane for Nigeria Air will arrive in the country on Friday ahead of the commencement of operations. Speaking during an appearance on Channels Television’s Sunrise Daily on Thursday, presidential spokesman, Garba Shehu said the project will be a game changer, especially for international travel.

item.title: Kitui: Uhuru Kenyatta Goes On His Knees to Pray at Our Lady of Protection Shrine
item.description: Uhuru officially opened the grounds of Our Lady of Protection Shrine at Museve in Kitui county on Friday, June 25The head of state urged Kenyans to continue praying for peace and national unityHe was accompanied by several national and Ukambani leaders including former vice president Kalonzo Musyoka and Kitui governor Charity NgiluPAY ATTENTION: Help us change more lives, join TUKO.co.ke’s Patreon programme On Friday, June 25, President Uhuru Kenyatta went down on his knees to pray at Our Lady of Protection Shrine, Museve in Kitui county.

item.title: MakeupArtistGorda66 - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: American makeup artist who became a successful beauty vlogger despite having a large facial tumor known as a cystic hygroma. She created her channel to inspire others with disabilities, including those in the deaf community. She has collaborated with make-up brand Lurella and Lilly Lashes. Before Fame She went through multiple facial surgeries to reduce the size of her tumor as a child. Trivia She was featured on the popular YouTube channel Barcroft TV in August 2016.

item.title: Ned Luke - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Voice and television actor best known as the voice and motion capture model of Michael De Santa from the hit video game Grand Theft Auto V. Before Fame He landed his first voice acting job in 1991 as the voice of Raffles in Rover Dangerfield. He also appeared in television series like Angel Street, Guiding Light, and NYPD Blue early in his career. Trivia He's appeared in high-profile shows such as Law & Order: Special Victims Unit, All My Children, Diagnosis: Murder, and JAG.

item.title: Nnamdi Kanu Needs Prayers - Ifeanyi Ejiofor Gives Update On Detained IPOB Leader
item.description: Ifeanyi Ejiofor, the lead counsel to the detained leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu,  has revealed that the pro-Biafra agitator wants his supporters to keep praying for him. Naija News reports that Ejiofor stated this while giving update after his routine visit to the pro-Biafra agitator in the detention of the Department of State Services (DSS). While revealing that he visited Kanu in the company of his younger brother, Prince, Ejiofor stated that the defence team his well prepared for the October 21 court resumption.

Before Fame She used to craft jewelry for her self-titled design company. Trivia Outside her books, she has also penned short stories like The Man in the Moon and Prototype. Family Life Her husband crafts custom-made notebooks. Associated With Her debut novel, Everything, Everything, as adapted into a 2017 feature film starring Amandla Stenberg and Nick Robinson.

item.description: Songs were covered by many artists, including Warren Zevon and Emmylou Harris. Before Fame He played rhythm guitar for a band called The Shadows. Family Life He married second wife Callie Khouri in 2006. Associated With He played with Bob Dylan's band on the Rolling Thunder Revue as its touring guitarist.

item.title: Atiku Under Fire For Telling Northerners Not To Support Yoruba Or Igbo Candidate As President
item.description: Naija News reports that Atiku, during an Interactive Session with Arewa Joint Committee held on Saturday in Kaduna State, said Northerners need to vote for him because he is a Pan-Nigerian with a northern extraction that has built bridges across the country. The former Vice President said Northerners do not need any Yoruba or Igbo candidate as the next President of the country in 2023. He had said: “What the average Northerner needs is somebody who’s from the north and also understands that part of the country and has been able to build bridges across the country.

item.title: Hii Kenya ni yetu sote: Raila apigia debe BBI kaunti ya Nairobi
item.description: Kinara wa ODM Raila Odinga Alhamisi Jnauari 21 alizuru eneo bunge la Westlands Nairobi kupigia debe mswada wa BBI. Raila alisema wakazi walimhakikishia kuwa wako tayari kuunga mkono mswada wa BBI. "Nilipata kujumuika na wakazi wa Westlands na ujumbe wao ulikuwa wazi. Hii Kenya ni yetu sisi sote. Ujumbe wao na imani kwa zoezi la BBI ni wazi," alisema Raila. Raila aliwaambia mambo mazuri yamo njiani na kuwataka wawe na subira ya Kenya mpya.

item.title: Lady Gaga Has a New Boyfriend and No, It's Not Bradley Cooper
item.description: Who is Lady Gaga's new boyfriend Dan Horton? The singer sparked romance rumors with the sound engineer, whom she's known for years. Source: GettyIt seems likeLady Gaga might be done with "bad romance." The A Star is Born actress is sparking dating rumors with sound engineer Dan Horton, which might be some sad news for anyone hoping that she might actually date former co-star Bradley Cooper. On the heels of releasing a lucrative Amazon makeup line and announcing a Las Vegas residency, it seems like 2019 might be shaping up to be Lady Gaga's year.

item.title: What Happened to Danny Tidwell? The 'So You Think You Can Dance' Star Was Only 35 When He Died
item.description: ‘So You Think You Can Dance’ finalist Danny Tidwell died when he was only 35 years old — and it was the result of a tragic a car accident. Source: Chris Ryan - Corbis/GettyLongtime fans of Fox's So You Think You Can Dance were heartbroken to learn that a former contestant on the dancing competition has died. Danny Tidwell was only 35 at the time of his death on March 6 — but at the time the news first broke of his passing, it wasn't immediately clear what happened to him.

item.title: Drew Chadwick - Age, Family, Bio
We Don't Want AFRICOM In Nigeria
item.description: The Nigerian Labour Congress (NLC) has declared that relocating the United States African Command (AFRICOM) from Stuggart Germany to Africa is not in the best interest of the continent and Nigeria. The NLC president, Ayuba Wabba argued that it will be counter-productive to bring foreign soldiers on local soil to fight insurgency. The labour leader who rejected the physical presence of foreign soldiers on Nigerian soil, however, welcomed the idea of exchanging intelligence information between the countries so as to overcome insecurity.

item.title: Why Fans Are Demanding #BrendonUrieSpeakUp
item.description: Panic! At The Disco frontman is in hot water over new allegations of inappropriate conduct — which have brought up even more controversy. Source: GettyIn the wake of accusations of sexual misconduct by Panic! At The Disco guard Zack Hall, the band is facing yet another major controversy. Frontman Brendon Urie has been accused of sexually assaulting a minor. With the rise of the new allegations, Urie's history of racist, sexist, and ableist actions, in addition to other times in which he touched someone without their consent, have come back to light.

item.title: "I Am Alive & Will Only Die At The Appointed Time" - Dead Boko Haram Leader, Shekau Appears In New V
item.description: Leader of the most dreaded and wanted Boko Haram Terrorists, Abubakar Shekau, today, Wednesday, said the Nigerian Military should bury itself in shame because he is alive. Shekau also claimed responsibility of Tuesday, 17th September, 2013 attacks in Benisheik, Borno State where over 160 people were either shot dead or slaughtered and hundreds of houses burnt. The then Joint Task Force (JTF) spokesman in Borno State, Lt Col Sagir Musa, had issued a statement on 19th August, 2013 to the effect that “Intelligence report available to the Joint Task Force (JTF) Operation Restore Order revealed that Abubakar Shekau, the most dreaded and wanted terrorists leader may have died.

item.title: 'The Book of Boba Fett' Latest News and Updates
item.description: The American space Western The Book of Boba Fett is part of the Star Wars franchise and is a spinoff of The Mandalorian. The show takes place after the events of Return of the Jedi and follows Boba Fett and Fennec Shand as they attempt to make a name for themselves in the galaxy's underworld by taking control of the territory from Jabba the Hutt. The Book of Boba Fett was created by Jon Favreau and directed by Robert Rodriguez.

item.title: WARNING! 6 tests to help you spot fake rice
item.description: Reports indicate that China produces fake rice which is mixed with plastic for exportation to African countries including Nigeria. China has a history of making fake food items and the fake rice phenomenon has been there for a while. A reputable English-language newspaper in Korea, The Korea Times, reported that “China famous for having all, making all, has now been reported to have made rice out of plastic and has distributed it.

item.title: Burna Boy Reveals What He Would Have Done To Wizkid If He Wasn't His Friend
item.description: Grammy award-winner, Damini Ebunoluwa Ogulu professionally known as Burnaboy has said he would have punched his colleague,Wizkid in the face if they weren’t friends. Burna Boy made the statement whilst engaging in a messy Twitter fight with some fans of Nigerian singer, Wizkid popularly known as Wizkid FC. Trouble started when a fan tagged the singer, saying that he wasn’t the best selling African artist, which didn’t sit well with Burna who replied, ‘Come and collect it from me and give Wizkid na’.

item.title: Mukesh (Movie Actor) - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Famous for his roles in such Indian Malayalam-language films as Boeing Boeing (1985), Ramji Rao Speaking (1989), and In Harihar Nagar (1990), he is also notable for his Filmfare Award-winning work as the producer of the 2007 Malayalam feature Katha Parayumpol. Before Fame Before making his screen acting debut in the 1982 movie Balloon, he completed degrees at both Sree Narayana College, Kollam and Government Law College, Thiruvananthapuram. Trivia In 2013, he won a Kerala Film Critics Association Award for his portrayal of the character Joy in the Malayalam film English: An Autumn in London.

Before Fame He attended the Drama Centre London and graduated in 2010 after completing both his Bachelor's and Master's. Trivia His parents were forced to change their name after the 'goneniya' started by the Bolsheviks.

item.title: Imo LP Alleges INEC Obstruction In Access To BVAS Machine
item.description: The Labour Party in Imo State has raised concerns over INEC’s alleged refusal to comply with a court order allowing inspection of the Bimodal Voter Accreditation System. The Imo State Labour Party (LP) has expressed apprehensions regarding INEC’s reported reluctance to adhere to a court order, preventing the party from inspecting the Bimodal Voter Accreditation System (BVAS) utilized in the November 11 governorship election. The LP contends that the alleged obstruction by INEC is impeding the party’s ability to fulfil the court-ordered forensic examination of the BVAS.

She posted her first TikTok in April 2020. In the video, she lip syncs to a song.

item.title: Elfriede Geiringer - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Austrian-born concentration camp survivor who married Otto Frank, the father of famous diarist Anne Frank, after both had lost their children and first spouses in the Holocaust. Before Fame Her family lived in hiding in the Netherlands for two years before being captured by the Nazis in 1944 and sent to Auschwitz. Trivia She died in London at the age of ninety-three. Family Life Her first marriage -- to Erich Geiringer -- produced two children, Eva and Heinz.

item.title: I Only Commended Tinubu's Political Success Not Lifestyle
item.description: The Overseer of the Citadel Global Community Church in Lagos, Pastor Tunde Bakare, has described those that criticized him for commending a former Governor of Lagos State, Asiwaju Bola Tinubu, as undertakers. Pastor Tunde Bakare said his commendation of Tinubu’s political success was not an approval of his lifestyle. Naija News had reported that Bakare had in a viral video praised the impact of the former governor of Lagos state on Nigeria politics.

item.title: Manuel Neuer - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Goalkeeper who won the Golden Glove Award while leading the German national team to a World Cup Championship in 2014. He was named ESM Goalkeeper of the Year in 2012 for Bayern Munich and he played for FC Schalke 04 from 2006 to 2011.  Before Fame He began his 14-year youth career with Schalke 04 in 1991. Trivia Named Best Bundesliga Goalkeeper in 2007 and Footballer of the Year in Germany in 2011. Family Life He dated Kathrin Gilch for a number of years but the couple split up in 2014.

item.title: Autopsy Confirms Ifeanyi Adeleke Drowned
item.description: Fresh information has emerged that the autopsy conducted on the corpse of Ifeanyi Adeleke, son ofDavido and his fiancée, Chioma Rowland, confirms that the little boy drowned. Naija News reports that the Lagos State Police Command on Saturday disclosed that the result from the autopsy indicated that three-year-old Ifeanyi truly died as a result of drowning in the pool at his father’s residence in the state as speculated. The state Police Public Relations Officer, Benjamin Hundeyin, who confirmed the autopsy result told Punch that “Autopsy has been concluded.

item.title: Did Joe Shapiro Really Take Donald Trump's SAT Exam? Ask Mary Trump
item.description: Donald Trump's Niece, Mary, Alleges He Got Joe Shapiro to Take the SAT for HimBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated July 12 2020, 4:16 p.m. ET Source: InstagramAny U.S. high school student will tell you what a royal pain in the patoot it is to study for and take the SATs. The three-hour-long standardized exam is utilized by universities all over the country in their selection process. It's admittedly a small piece of the puzzle when it comes to deciding an applicant's acceptance, according to many admissions employees.

item.title: Mawuna Koutonin's Call Upon The African Diaspora
item.description: Africans, African diaspora included, could do a lot to help their own continent develop and raise to glory. Why aren't they doing anything? And if they are, why isn't it enough? Legit.ng guest author Mawuna Koutonin takes a closer look at the problem and comes up with a number of solutions. Africans are sending their kids to school to gain knowledge that would help solve their problems, but the kids are yet to fulfill that promise.

item.title: 2023 Presidency: We Are 100% Prepared
item.description: A former Secretary to the Government of the Federation (SGF) Babachir Lawal has expressed confidence that the national leader of the All Progressive Congress (APC), Asiwaju Bola Tinubu will clinch the party’s 2023 presidential ticket. Lawal who claimed Tinubu and his team are fully prepared as seasoned politicians to turn every challenge into opportunities added that should the former Lagos State Governor lose, then he will go home, lick his wounds and support whoever emerges as the APC candidate.

item.title: Anthony Padilla - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Internet sensation who gained fame on YouTube with the comedy group Smosh. He announced he was leaving the group in mid-2017 but later returned. He runs a self-titled YouTube channel, which has earned over 7 million subscribers. In 2019, he began hosting the talk show Throw Back with Nickelodeon. Before Fame He played tennis in high school. He created smosh.com in 2002 and soon thereafter teamed up with his longtime friend Ian Hecox.

item.title: Delta APC Guber Candidate, Omo-Agege Picks Running Mate
item.description: The All Progressives Congress (APC) governorship candidate in Delta State, Senator Ovie Omo-Agege has picked his running mate for the 2023 general elections. Recall that the Deputy Senate President polled a total of 1,190 votes and returned unopposed by a total of 1,235 accredited delegates at the APC governorship primaries held in Asaba in May 2022. Ahead of the 2023 general elections, Omo-Agege on Thursday announced Ossai Osanebi as his running mate for the gubernatorial elections in the state.

item.title: Like Port Harcourt, Ibadan Supporters Defy Rain To Stage 1 Million March For Peter Obi (Video)
item.description: Supporters of Labour Party (LP) presidential candidate,Peter Obi, in Ibadan, the Oyo State capital, have taken the bold step to stage their planned ‘1-million man’ march. Naija News reports the supporters, mostly youths, defied the rain and marched in their numbers around the city of Ibadan on Saturday morning. The march is part of the support for the Obi/Datti 2023 presidential ticket. A similar march is understood to be going on in Ogun State, and had previously held in States like Auchi (Edo State), Makurdi (Benue State) Afikpo (Ebonyi State), Onistha (Anambra State) and Port Harcourt (Rivers).

item.title: Robert Redford - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actor and director who founded the Sundance Film Festival. He starred in classics such as All the President's Men, The Sting, and Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. His directorial debut, Ordinary People, received the Academy Award for Best Picture and earned him the Academy Award for Best Director. Before Fame He was asked to leave the University of Colorado, after which he studied painting at the Pratt Institute and acting at the American Academy of Dramatic Arts.

item.title: Buhari approves appointment of Salihijo Ahmad as new MD for Rural Electrification Agency
item.description: - President Muhammadu Buhari appoints Ahmad Salihijo Ahmad as managing director and chief executive officer (CEO) of the Rural Electrification Agency (REA) - The appointment is disclosed on Tuesday morning, December 31, in a statement by the federal ministery of power - The president also appoints Olaniyi Alaba Netufo as the executive director - southwest and Eddi Mietuade Smith Julius as a non-executive director, south-south President Muhammadu Buhari has carried out a major change in the power sector with the appointment of Ahmad Salihijo Ahmad as the managing director and chief executive officer (CEO) of the Rural Electrification Agency (REA).

item.title: Buhari Govt Forced Ayade, Matawalle To Join APC
item.description: Northern Governors elected on the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) have accused the Muhammadu Buhari-led administration of intimidating colleagues to join the All Progressives Congress (APC). Naija News reports that the Taraba State Governor, Darius Ishaku, stated this after a meeting with his colleagues in Abuja, late on Wednesday. Recall that the Governors of Ebonyi, Cross River and Zamfara; David Umahi, Ben Ayade and Bello Matawalle respectively, have recently joined the APC from the PDP.

item.title: Lynn Goldsmith - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Multi-award winning portrait photographer whose work has been featured in The Smithsonian, The Polaroid Collection, The Kodak Collection, and The Museum of Modern Art to name just a few. Her photos have appeared on and between the covers of Life, Time, and The New Yorker among numerous others. Before Fame She became the youngest member accepted into the Director's Guild of America and was the director of Joshua Television, ABC's In Concert, and We're An American Band.

item.title: We Are Still Paying Interest on Loans Owed by Our Grandfathers, Stonebwoy Cries
item.description: - Stonebwoy is worried about African governments borrowing and leaving debts to be paid by younger generations - Kenya is among countries whose citizens are worried their authorities have high appetites for loans - According to the 2021 Budget Policy Statement, Kenya's public debt as of June 2020 stood at KSh 7. 06 trillion, and claims are rife that even unborn children are already indebted - Most governments, Kenya included, have defended their borrowing sprees stating the loans are injected into profitable infrastructural projects

item.title: 'The Son' Takes Many Dark Twists and Turns, But Here Is What the Ending Means
item.description: Want the ending of ‘The Son’ explained? Here's everything you need to know about the many twists and turns of Netflix's Argentine thriller. Source: Netflix*Warning: Spoilers ahead* Netflix recently released the Argentine thriller The Son (El Hijo) on their platform, and if you're into convoluted suspense, we definitely recommend adding this movie to your queue. It follows the wild story of Lorenzo (Joaquin Furriel), who's trying to understand what happened to his son through two parallel storylines.

Nigerian Army To Retire 11 Major Generals This Week
item.description: At least eleven Major Generals would be retiring from the Nigerian Army this Wednesday, October 12, 2022, Naija News learnt. The development was disclosed in Lagos yesterday at the flag-off of the reunion and Pulling Out Parade of 11 Major Generals attached to the Ordnance Corps. The top army officers to be retired are revealed as Maj Gen AA Martins, Maj Gen RO Yusuf, Maj Gen JI Unuigbe, Maj Gen HR Momoh and Maj Gen MA Masanawa.

item.title: Forget about Curfews and Focus on Vaccinating People, Duale Tells Uhuru
item.description: On Wednesday, August 18, President Uhuru Kenyatta extended the nationwide curfew by another 60 daysThe extension of the nationwide 10pm to 4am curfew is aimed at curbing the spread of the dreaded COVID-19Social gatherings like weddings, celebrations of marriage or traditional unions ceremonies and funerals will be attended by not more than 100 peopleGarissa Township MP Aden Duale has hit out at President Uhuru Kenyatta following the extension of the nationwide 10pm to 4am curfew.

item.title: Nollywood Mourn The Death Of Actress
item.description: The death of Nollywood actress, Chrisphina Adinusor has thrown the movie industry into mourning. According to report, Chrisphina Adinusor a member of the Rivers State Chapter of Actors Guild of Nigeria (AGN) died of cardiac arrest at about 2am during her visit to Lagos on March 28th 2014. This is coming just few months after the movie industry lost a popular Nollywood actress, Ijeoma Perpetual Okorie who died during childbirth in Rivers State.

item.title: Zamfara First Class Emir Kidnapped By Unknown Gunmen
item.description: Gunmen suspected to be kidnappers have reportedly abducted the Emir of Bungudu in Zamfara State, Alhaji Hassan Attahiru. Naija News gathered the first class traditional ruler was kidnapped on Tuesday by the gunmen along the Kaduna-Abuja highway. During the encounter, a policeman said to be on the Emir’s security detail was killed during a shootout with the abductors. After killing his security detail, the gunmen escaped with the Emir, The Nation reports.

item.title: Indie Romance Author Susan Meachen Has Been Accused of Faking Her Death
item.description: Author Susan Meachen was reported to have died from suicide in 2020. Yet, new reports suggest she created a hoax around her death. Source: Getty ImagesIt's not a stretch to say that in both traditional and independent publishing, book sales are often reliant on the author doing their own marketing. However, it seems that some authors have gone to extreme lengths to promote their books. Enter: author Susan Meachen, who has recently resurfaced online after reports of her death by suicide in 2020.

item.title: Tinubu, APC Preparing For An Election Rerun
item.description: The Labour Party has asserted that the President Bola Tinubu-led government is preparing for an election rerun. Naija News reports that the National Chairman of the Labour Party (LP), Barrister Julius Abure, submitted on Monday during a virtual meeting held with Nigerian-American Coalition for Justice and Democracy led by the party’s Diaspora Chairman in the United States, Prof. Eddie Oparaoji, According to Abure, Tinubu, and the All Progressives Congress (APC), are preparing for an election rerun just like the Labour Party is.

item.title: Auditor General dismisses report Kenya could lose Mombasa port to China over debt
item.description: - The Auditor General said the report did not come from his office - The said report alleged government named KPA as borrower of loan used to construct SGR - According to the report, revenue generated by KPA would be used to pay the loan - The report indicated in the event KPA fails to pay the debt, then China could take over corporation's assets - Kenya owes China over KSh 320 billion used to construct SRG between Nairobi and Mombasa

item.description: Former President Goodluck Jonathan on Tuesday met with members of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) Reconciliation and Strategy Committee. Naija News reports that this was part of efforts to resolve the internal crisis rocking the main opposition party. This newspaper reports that members of the reconciliation committee include, its Chairman, former Senate President, Bukola Saraki. item.title: Trigger-Happy Police Inspector Goes Berserk, Murders Colleague In Cold Blood In Abia
item.description: A police inspector, Ugwor Samuel, has been shot dead by his colleague Inspector Atule Benedict in Umuahia, Abia state capital. Naija News understands that the suspect and deceased were both attached to the member representing Isiala Ngwa North state constituency, in the Abia State House of Assembly, Ginger Onwusibe. Samuel was reportedly shot dead by Atule after a disagreement ensued between them. The suspect reportedly refused to allow other policemen in his team to disarm him as he went berserk and promised to kill other policemen.

item.title: CNG Raises Alarm, Lists Major Threats To 2023 Elections
item.description: The Coalition of the Northern Groups (CNG) has listed the major hindrance to the conduct of the 2023 general elections. In a statement on Sunday by its spokesman, Abdul-Azeez Suleiman, the group listed the major threats to the upcoming elections as rising insecurity and drug abuse menace in the country. He advised the Muhammadu Buhari government to immediately address the security challenges facing the country and solve the drug problem among the youths.

item.title: Former Chief Of Army Staff, Chris Alli Is Dead
item.description: Nigeria’s former Chief of Army Staff, Major General Chris Alli (rtd), is dead. Naija News reports that Ali’s death was announced in a statement released via X (formerly Twitter) by the Nigerian Army’s spokesperson, Brigadier General Onyema Nwachukwu. Ali, who served as the COAS between November 1993 and August 1994, died in a military hospital in Lagos in the early hours of Sunday, November 19, after a brief illness. The Chief of Army Staff (COAS), Lieutenant General Taoreed Lagbaja, via the statement released, expressed heartfelt condolences on behalf of the Nigerian Army (NA) on the passing of Alli.

item.title: What I Told Ningi When He Brought The Budget Padding Issue To Me
item.description: The Chief Whip of the Senate, Ali Ndume, has disclosed that he warned his colleague, Abdul Ningi on the allegation that the 2024 budget was padded by over N3 trillion. Ndume said he told Ningi to seek a consultant to analyse the budget. However he stated that Ningi refused to listen to him. Recall that, Ningi who represents Bauchi Central at the Senate, was on Tuesday suspended for three months over claims of budget padding.

item.title: Mbunge John Kiarie ahojiwa kuhusiana na madai yake mtandaoni kuhusu coronaviru
item.description: Duru zinaarifu Mbunge wa Dagoretti Kusini John Kiarie amekamatwa na maafisa wa DCI kuandikisha taarifa kuhusiana na ujumbe aliochapisha kwenye mtandao kuhusu coronavirus. Kiarie alikuwa akihojiwa na makachero hao wa DCI kuhusiana na aliyoyasema kwenye ujumbe wake mrefu katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook. Habari Nyingine: Mhudumu wa boda boda aaga dunia akikimbizana na polisi wa kafyu "Bado tunamhoji na sijui iwapo ataachiliwa au atalala ndani," mkuu wa makachero wa DCI eneo la Dagoretti Francis Wanjau aliambia K24.

item.title: 'Why Falconets Slept On Bare Floors, Chairs At Istanbul Airport'
item.description: The General Secretary of the Nigeria Football Federation, Mohammed Sanusi has debunked reports that the Falconets were stranded at the Istanbul airport, Turkey. Naija News reports that earlier on Wednesday morning, photos of the Falconets sleeping on bare floors and chairs made the rounds online, which generated outrage. However, Sanusi during an interview with PUNCH said the girls missed their connecting flight from Istanbul, Turkey to Nigeria. He further described the reports as mischievous and misleading, saying the airline was at fault.

item.title: Nigerian star Burna Boy beats Mr Eazi, the rest to scoop BET 2019 Best International Act award
item.description: Celebrated Nigerian artiste Burna Boy has been named 2019 winner of the best international act in the just concluded BET Awards. Burna Boy who had been nominated alongside Africa's greatest acts, Teni Makanaki and Mr Eazi, beat his competitors to clinch the prestigious award. READ ALSO: Wema Sepetu released from police custody on bail days after she was locked up READ ALSO: Singer Bahati, Diana Marua trolled for stage managing infidelity in their marriage The singer was not present at the awards gala but was lucky enough to see his mother Bose Ogulu who double up as his manager collect the award for him.

item.title: Singer, Simi Dismisses Pregnancy Speculations
item.description: Sensational Nigerian singer and songwriter Simisola Kosoko Gold better known as Simi, has dismissed the rumours that she is pregnant with baby number two. Naija News reports the Duduke singer sparks pregnancy speculations after posting a photo on her Instastories showing her baby girl, Adejare, in a posture that seemed like she was about to somersault captioning it, the picture “New day, New style.” Reacting to the notion, Simi simply quelled the rumour as she took to her Instagram stories, saying, “Lotta people saying babies do that when their mom is pregnant.

item.title: Seth Meyers - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Comedian who was the host of Weekend Update on Saturday Night Live, where he served as the show's head writer from 2006 to 2014. In 2014, he began hosting his own late night program on NBC. Before Fame While attending Northwestern University, he was member of the improv sketch group Mee-Ow. item.title: Tinubu Departs Nigeria For Qatar Tomorrow
item.description: President Bola Ahmed Tinubu will on Thursday, February 29th, 2024, depart Lagos State and embark on a two-day official visit to the State of Qatar to further strengthen cooperation between the two nations in several areas, including security, cultural exchange, and economic development. Naija News reports that this is to honour an invitation by His Highness, Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani, Emir of the State of Qatar. This was made known in a statement to journalists on Wednesday night by Tinubu’s Special Adviser on Media and Publicity, Ajuri Ngelale.

item.title: Jasmine Jade - Age, Family, Bio
NLC Storms NASS, Demands Autonomy For Local Government, Judiciary
item.description: The Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) on Monday stormed the National Assembly to demand autonomy for the local government and the judiciary. Naija News reports that the labour union led by its National President, Comrade Ayuba Wabba, arrived at the National Assembly complex at about 11:am. According to the banners carried by the workers, they are demanding that the lawmakers vote in favour of autonomy for the local government and the judiciary ahead of the clause by clause voting on the ongoing constitution amendment process.

item.title: 15 best cyberpunk movies you should definitely watch on Netflix
item.description: If neon lights with a dash of cybernetic enhancements are your favorite form of entertainment, then it is time to cozy up and enjoy the best cyberpunk movies ever. You can expect to see rebellion, revenge, posthumanism, dehumanization, isolation, and alienation in these films. For most people, the lush color palette is usually the most striking thing in these movies. What are cyberpunk movies? These are a sub-genre of Sci-Fi films that typically focus on a poor city where the evil powers take control and run things the way they please.

item.title: Blame Buhari Govt Not Us For Next Nationwide Strike
item.description: Members of the Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) around the Yola zone, Adamawa State, has asked Nigerians to hold the Muhammadu Buhari-led administration responsible for its next strike following its refusal comply with the renegotiation of the 2009 agreement. Naija News reports that members of the ASUU, Yola chapter, comprise of those at Adamawa State University (ADSU) Mubi, Federal University Gashua (FUGA), Modibbo Adama University (MAU) Yola, Taraba State University (TSU) Jalingo, University of Maiduguri (UNIMAID), and Yobe State University (YSU) Damaturu.

item.title: 2023: APC, PDP, Others Want To Win Elections By Hook Or Crook
item.description: Former Chairman of the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC), Professor Attahiru Jega, has claimed that the All Progressives Congress (APC), the Peoples Democratic Parties (PDP) and other parties are planning the win the 2023 general elections illegally. Naija News reports that Jega made the claim on Thursday at the parliamentary seminar of the ECOWAS Parliament in Winneba, Ghana. He called for a reform of the electoral process and system in ECOWAS member states to block electoral fraud and ensure free and fair elections.

item.title: June Horoscope | Famous Birthdays
item.description: The sixth month of the year, June marks the transition from Spring into the hot Summer months. As June 21st arrives, so does the longest day of the year, the Summer Solstice. With the Summer Solstice begins a long-list of Summer traditions and activities. June can also be credited with holidays, such as Father's Day, LGBT Pride Month, and Emancipation Day in the United States. The two zodiac signs associated with the month of June are the Gemini and Cancer.

item.description: There is a general saying that the take-home pay of most Nigerian workers can’t ‘take them home’, hence, most of them usually look for extra means of sourcing money to meet their financial demands. Others that actually give funds to their clients have become loan sharks, adopting unconventional means of going after their clients who may default as there is usually no collateral involved.

item.title: IPOB Threatens Buhari Govt, Gives FG Deadline To Release Nnamdi Kanu
item.description: The proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) has given the federal government of Nigeria a deadline of August 8, 2021, to release its leader, Nnamdi Kanu, or face the consequences. The group said if the government fails to release Kanu on or before the said date, it will mobilize and lock down the entire southeast region of the country. Naija News recalls Kanu who is currently in the custody of the Department of State Services (DSS) was re-arrested and brought back to Nigeria by the government a few weeks ago.

item.title: Will Jughead Get Married in Season 5 of 'Riverdale'? He Did Dream It
item.description: 'Riverdale' fans, rejoice! The high school mega-drama is back, and with all kinds of twists. Some viewers are wondering what's in store for Jughead. Does he get married? Fans probably know Season 5 is going to be totally different — the story fast-forwards seven whole years, which means the gang is all grown up.

item.title: Bandit Terrorists Abduct Permanent Secretary, Granddaughter In Niger
item.description: Gunmen suspected to be bandit terrorists have kidnapped the Permanent Secretary in Niger Ministry of Transportation, Dr. Ibrahim Garba Musa and his granddaughter. It was gathered that the perm sec who was in Zugeru for a wedding celebration was abducted in his house on Friday night. A family source told The Nation that terrorists gained access to the government official house after breaking down the gate to abduct Musa who was relaxing after the wedding celebration.

item.title: Moneybags: Lawan Writes APC Delegates Ahead Of Presidential Primaries
item.description: The President of the Nigerian Senate and 2023 Presidential hopeful, Ahmad Lawan, has written to the All Progressives Congress, APC, delegates ahead of the party’s presidential primaries. Lawan who is aspiring to succeed President Muhammadu Buhari admonished delegates to consider competency than moneybags. The Yobe-State politician charged the delegates to choose a person that would lead and not rule the country. Lawan made the call in a letter written to the APC Delegates on Wednesday, Naija News understands.

However, the music star has insisted that her degree “did not waste” despite not using the certificate or being engaged by any media firm. item.title: PDP Mocks APC Over INEC's Dissaproval Of National Convention, NEC
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has mocked the All Progressives Congress (APC) over the disapproval of its National Convention scheduled for March 26, 2022. item.title: Juventus Cristiano Ronaldo Becomes Football's First Billionaire

item.title: What is constituted authority? Meaning, types, importance
item.description: Every country with a defined territory and government has a constitution. The constitution upholds the rights and freedoms of its people. It also ensures proper dispersion of power among different individuals and state organs. In Nigeria, people who perform specific roles for the good of all form the constituted authority. Through constituted authority, sovereign states and nations run smoothly. They have frameworks of laws and discipline that citizens and residents follow.

item.description: The Nigerian Air Force reportedly paid a ransom to bandit terrorists to get back an anti-aircraft gun seized from the Nigerian Army. item.title: Tinubu Donates N50m To Victims Of Terrorists Attacks In Zamfara
item.description: The National leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Asiwaju Bola Tinubu, has donated N50 million to Zamfara communities recently attacked by terrorists. Tinubu, who declared his presidential ambition on Monday, made the donation to the state governor, Bello Matawalle during a visit to Gusau, the state capital, on Thursday. He was accompanied to Zamfara by former Borno governor, Senator Kashim Shettima; the former Chairman of the Economic and Financial Crime Commission (EFCC), Malam Nuhu Ribadu and former APC National Vice Chairman, South-west, Chief Pius Akinyelure.

item.title: EFCC Indicts Buharis Minister, Contractor In N37 Billion Fraud
item.description: The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) has uncovered a total sum of N37,170,855,753.44 allegedly laundered in the Ministry of Humanitarian Affairs under former minister, Sadiya Umar-Farouk. According to Punch, details of an ongoing probe by the anti-graft agency shows that the money was transferred from the Federal Government’s coffers and sent to 38 different bank accounts. The bank accounts are domiciled in five legacy commercial banks belonging to or connected with a contractor, James Okwete.

item.title: A Timeline of Joni Mitchell and Graham Nash's Relationship
item.description: Breaking down the complete timeline of Joni Mitchell's famous relationship with Graham Nash, including how it began and ended. In terms of impact on popular music in the 20th century, few artists can hold a candle to Joni Mitchell. Regarded by Rolling Stone as "one of the greatest songwriters ever," Joni's discography has nabbed her 10 Grammys, three Juno Awards, and an ASCAP Pop Award. item.description: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has declared the candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Usman Ododo as the winner of the Kogi state governorship election. The Returning Officer for the election, Prof. Johnson Urama of the University of Nigeria, Nnsuka, announced the results at the INEC state collation centre in Lokoja, the state capital, on Sunday night. Ododo polled 446,237 votes to defeat Murtala Ajaka of the Social Democratic Party (SDP), who came second with 259,052 votes.

item.title: Kakamega stampede: DPP says no one to blame for school incident
item.description: - The DPP said even after investigating the stampede, witnesses could not positively identify boys who allegedly blocked the stairway causing the accident - Haji directed the case to be presented before the magistrate for formal closure by way of a public inquest - At least 15 pupils lost their lives and dozens injured during the stampede that happened on the evening of Monday, February 3, 2020 - Parents who lost their children in the incident said they were not satisfied with the report and threatened to proceed to court to sue the Ministry of Education

item.title: Maduka Okoye Reacts As Nigerians Drag Him On Instagram

Some have attributed the loss to Okoye after he failed to stop Tunisa’s Youssef Msakni from scoring the winning goal at the 57th minute. Taking to the comment section of Okoye’s Instagram account, Nigerians poured out their frustration with some asking the 22-year-old to leave football and go into modelling.

item.title: 'I Have A Man Already'

The reality TV star revealed via her Instagram story that men are constantly on her DM trying to win her affection but she has no interest in them because she already has a man. She wrote: “I’m on every Ni**a hit list. Check my DM. Problem is I got a man.” Recall that sometime last year Naija News reported that Maria was accused of snatching Cubana’s Chief Priest sister’s husband, Kelvin.

If you've been sleeping on one of the best show revivals in recent memory, now's your chance to catch up. The Peacock series follows the same premise as the original — Will Smith (played by Jabari Banks in the revival) is sent to the affluent suburb of Bel-Air by his concerned mother after he gets in a fight in West Philly.

item.title: Hayden Christensen - Age, Family, Bio
Ogalla: There Is A Plan To Systematically Humiliate The Igbo People
item.description: A chieftain of Ohanaeze Ndigbo, the apex Igbo socio-cultural organization, Okechukwu Isiguzoro has called on President Bola Tinubu to carry out an investigation into the theft allegation against the Chief of Naval Staff, Emmanuel Ogalla. He insisted that there must be a comprehensive and unbiased investigation into the allegation, adding that there is a plot of systemic humiliation against Igbos. The factional Secretary-General of Ohanaeze, however, insisted that the apex Igbo socio-cultural body backs Tinubu.

item.title: Yahaya Bello's Ally Emerges Kogi APC Gubernatorial Candidate
item.description: A former Auditor General for Local Governments in Kogi State, Ahmed Usman Ododo, has won the All Progressives Congress (APC) gubernatorial primary election. Naija News reports that the APC gubernatorial direct primary was held in the State on Friday. Ododo scored a total of 78,704 votes to defeat six other contestants in the governorship race. Ododo, who won with a very wide margin, defeated the distant runner-up, Mohammed Ozigi Salami, who scored 1,506 votes while the Senator representing Kogi West Senatorial District, Smart Adeyemi, scored the least number of votes – 311.

item.title: Fidelity, GTCO Lead Volume Chart As Investors Gain N3.98bn From 4,099 Deals
item.description: Fidelity stocks and Guaranty Trust Holding Company (GTCO) led the value chart in 4,099 deals exchanged at the Nigerian Exchange Limited on Wednesday, March 23, 2022. A total of 267.48 million shares valued at N3.22 billion were exchanged in 4,099 deals at the eight hours trading period yesterday, Naija News understands. Fidelity led the volume chart with 68.82 million units traded, while GTCO took the lead of the value chart in deals worth N621.

item.title: IPOB Has Proven Its Not A Terrorist Organisation Doyin Okupe
item.description: Former Presidential aide, Doyin Okupe, on Friday stated that the Indigenous Peoples of Biafra has proved that it is not a terrorist group following its decision to cancel the sit-at-home order that could have affected the governorship election in Anambra State. Okupe in a post on his Facebook account noted that it was time for President Muhammadu Buhari-led government to negotiate with IPOB and its leader, Nnamdi Kanu. He said, “This decision of IPOB is a very reasonable one, coming from an organisation whose major concern is justice, equity and self-determination for its people.

item.title: Tinubu Shares Thought On Buhari's Govt, Previous Administrations
item.description: Former Governor of Lagos State and the 2023 presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu, has shared his thought about President Muhammadu Buhari’s administration in the last eight years. The presidential hopeful who spoke today during the inauguration of the APC Women Campaign Council at the presidential villa in Abuja said the previous administration led by the opposition Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) was full of looters. Tinubu commended the incumbent government led by Buhari, saying it was able to salvage 36 states of the federation from the former ruling party which was unable to pay civil servants salaries.

item.title: Wike vs Atiku: Give Igbos National Chairman Position Or We Take Our Votes Elsewhere
item.description: A socio-political group known as the South East Revival Group (SERG) has threatened that Igbos would not vote for the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in the 2023 elections except certain conditions are met. SERG in a statement on Friday signed by its President and National Coordinator, Chief Willy Ezugwu rejected the post of Board of Trustees (BOT) chairman given to the region by the PDP, saying anything short of the chairmanship position is not good enough.

item.description: National leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Ahmed Tinubu, says his connection with the former governor of Osun State, Bisi Akande, is so strong and cannot be broken. Tinubu on Thursday at the public presentation of the autobiography of Akande, titled: “My Participations,” in Lagos State described Akande as a hero, selfless leader and a self-disciplined politician. item.description: The National Association of Resident Doctors (NARD) has suspended its five-day nationwide warning strike following an agreement with the Federal Government. In a chat with Vanguard on Sunday, Orji said work resumes by today (Monday) in all Federal and State Teaching Hospitals as well as other hospitals where resident doctors are trained.

item.title: Mombasa county fires 86 doctors including KMPDU boss Chibanzi Mwachonda
item.description: - Mwachonda has been leading doctors in protesting against poor remuneration by the government - He has been championing for enhancement medics' salaries, risk allowances and medical cover among other grievances - Mombasa county government has axed him alongside 85 others for refusing to return to work since December 21 Mombasa county government has dismissed 86 doctors who have refused to return to work since they commenced their industrial action in December 2020.

item.title: NTSA yaelimisha madereva kuhusu kiwango cha pombe kinachoweza kuwafanya kukamatwa
item.description: - Mamlaka ya Kusimamia Uchukuzi na Usalama(NTSA) imetoa orodha ya kiwango cha pombe kinachoweza kumfanya mtu kukamatwa kwa kuendesha magari wakiwa walevi Katika jendwali hilo, NTSA inaelezea kuwa ilitoa jendwali hilo kukabiliana na vifo vinavyotokana na uendeshaji wa magari madereva wakiwa walevi. Jendwali hilo linaainisha viwango vya ulevi ndani ya damu ya mwendeshaji wa gari. Ikiwa viwango vya pombe viko juu, inamaanisha kuwa dereva anaweza kusababisha ajali anapoendesha gari. Tazama jendwali hilo.

item.title: Rahama Sadau Speaks Out On Alleged Police Arrest, Jail Sentence

She, therefore, urged people to stop spreading fake news about her and appreciated those who have reached out to ensure she’s doing well.

ECOWAS Defence Chiefs Will Invade Niger On 'D-Day'
item.description: West African defence leaders, under the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS), have agreed upon a tentative date for potential military intervention in Niger, should diplomatic negotiations fail. However, the specific date remains undisclosed. ECOWAS Commissioner for Political Affairs, Peace and Security, Abdel-Fatau Musah, discussed the potential “D-Day” following a two-day summit in Ghana. The focus was primarily on logistics and strategies regarding possible force in Niger, emphasizing that military action would be a final measure.

State of Origin certificate is mostly given based on the state of your parent, mostly the father originates from.

item.description: A State Trooper pulled a pit maneuver on Nicole Cooper while she was two months pregnant while she was looking for a safe place to pull over. Source: TwitterIf you've ever watched Cops then you're probably familiar with the PIT maneuver, which is short for pursuit intervention technique. Officers who are in pursuit of a driver who is refusing to stop their vehicle will "nudge" the back end of the car in question from the outside.

item.title: Charles B. Rangel - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Politician and Democrat who has spent over four decades in the New York House of Representatives and is known for his candor and genial character. In 2007 he became the first African-American Chair of the powerful House Ways and Means Committee. Before Fame He earned a Bronze Star in the Korean War while serving in the U.S. Army. Trivia He was the first member of Congress to declare support for the Occupy Wall Street movement and made several visits to their nearby demonstration site in Zuccotti Park.

She also worked at the wedding venue she later got married at, Chateau Cocomar, as a wedding planner and she was an event coordinator for an oil and gas firm in Houston.

item.title: Lack of commitment, capacity to implement national plans cause economic challenges Foundation
item.description: The African Capacity Building Foundation Fund,(ACBF) has identified lack of commitment, inadequate capacity of government institutions to implement development plans as largely responsible for economic challenges in the African region. The Executive Secretary of ACBF, Prof. Emmanuel Nnadozie, said this in Abuja on Friday. Nnadozie, an economist and a development expert, said the greatest challenge facing Nigeria at this time was the recession it found its self. He said there was no reason Nigeria should be in recession, given the robust nature of its development plans and visions over the years.

item.title: Osun Election: Why PDP Was Unable To Use Rally Venues
item.description: Governor Gboyega Oyetola of Osun State has refuted the claim by the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) that it was denied access to two rally venues in the state. The state chapter of the PDP had claimed that it was denied the use of Osogbo Township Stadium, Technical College field and the Freedom Park, which it applied to use for its final campaign rally on Thursday. Reacting to the claim in a chat with ThisDay on Thursday, the Special Adviser to Governor Oyetola on Political Affairs, Sunday Akere, said the PDP failed to book the two venues on time.

item.title: Is Season 3 the Last Season of 'Dickinson'? We Aren't Ready for It to End

item.title: Spider-Man Won't Be In Marvel Films Anymore And Fans Aren't Happy
item.description: Spider-Man Won't Be In Marvel Films Anymore and Fans Aren't HappyBy Mark PygasUpdated Aug. 21 2019, 8:24 a.m. ET Source: MarvelSpider-Man, and actor Tom Holland, won't be making an appearance in any new Marvel movies after Sony and Disney were unable to reach a deal over the character. While Spider-Man was created by Marvel, now owned by Disney, the film rights to the character are owned by Sony. In 2015, the two companies struck a deal to bring Peter Parker into the Marvel Cinematic Universe and star in five Marvel movies, from Captain America: Civil War to Spider-Man: Far From Home.

item.title: Tinubu Approves Upgrade Of 16 Teaching Hospitals Across Nigeria (Full List)
item.description: President Bola Tinubu has approved the immediate upgrade of key health infrastructure and equipment across all six geo-political zones. In a statement on Friday by his spokesman, Ajuri Ngelale, the President said the upgrade aligns with his administration’s vision of overhauling the health and social welfare sector for enhanced service delivery to all Nigerians. The President said the Ministry of Health and Social Welfare, in collaboration with the Nigeria Sovereign Investment Authority (NSIA), will comprehensively upgrade cancer-treatment infrastructure and other critical developments in six tertiary hospitals across several geo-political zones.

item.title: Tinubu Asks Atiku To Step Down From Presidential Race

Naija News reports that Tinubu, said this in Oporozo, Warri South-West Local Government Area of Delta State when he visited the revered monarch at his palace. According to him, they are few presidential candidates contesting for the 2023 general election.

item.title: Brielle Barbusca - Age, Family, Bio
Marketers Stop Importation As Cooking Gas Price Jumps By 240%
item.description: Nigerian Association of Liquefied Petroleum Gas Marketers say they will stop importing Liquefied Petroleum Gas, popularly called cooking gas because of inflation. According to reports, the import price has increased by 240 per cent for every 12.5 kilogram, which means the price has increased from ₦3,000 to N10,200 between January and October 2021. About 65 percent of Nigeria’s cooking gas is imported, while domestic production is 35 per cent. Stopping gas transportation could increase the cost of gas used.

item.title: Buhari To Attend Rally As APC Sets Up 40-Man LOC For Tinubu's Presidential Campaign Flag-off
item.description: The Director-General of the All Progressives Congress (APC) Presidential Campaign Council, Governor Simon Lalong of Plateau State has inaugurated a 40-man Local Organising Committee (LOC) to plan and work on hosting the flag-off of the party’s presidential campaigns. The LOC for the presidential campaign flag-off which is billed for November 15, 2022, in Jos, Plateau State is headed by the Deputy Speaker of the House of Representatives, Rt. Hon. Idris Wase.

item.title: Does 'The Great' on Hulu Have Any Accuracy? What the Show Got Right
item.description: 'The Great' on Hulu Took a Lot of Historical Liberties — Here's What It Did Get RightBy Shannon RaphaelMar. 22 2021, Updated 3:17 p.m. ET Source: HuluIf you're a sucker for a period piece, or you enjoy getting a slight historical education while you watch TV, then there's a good chance that the Hulu miniseries The Great has made it onto your binge list. The comedy series is all about the origins of Catherine the Great, who had the longest-ever reign as the empress of Russia from 1762 to 1796, and her plot to kill her husband, Emperor Peter III.

item.title: December 12 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Jupiter is the planetary ruler of your sign, but as you were born in the second Decan, or part, of the sign, Mars plays an equal role in your planetary influence. On the other hand, the powers of Mars influence your assertive and vigorous qualities. Your unique planetary influences make you more spontaneous and assertive when compared to other Sagittarius Decans.

item.title: NCDC Confirms 1,131 New COVID-19 Cases In Nigeria
item.description: The Nigeria Center for Disease Control (NCDC) on Wednesday evening, 10th February 2021, confirmed 1,131 new cases of Coronavirus disease infection in Nigeria. The new cases of COVID-19 infection were confirmed via a statement on the official Twitter handle of the health agency. This brings the total number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in Nigeria to 142,578 which includes 116,947 discharged cases and 1,702 deaths. Below is the breakdown of the latest cases according to states with Lagos State having the highest number of cases followed by Abuja, the Federal Capital Territory (FCT).

item.title: Rafikiye Matiba awataja Kibaki, Kalonzo miongoni mwa waliomdhulumu marehemu

item.title: Labour Party 'Unmask' Peter Obi's Running Mate
item.description: The Labour Party has submitted the name of Nigerian physcian cum politician, Doyin Okupe as Peter Obi’s running mate. To beat the Friday, June 17 deadline given to political parties by the Independent National Electoral Commission, Labour Party submitted Doyin Okupe name as a placeholder running mate and would later be changed after the party stakeholders must have agreed on the suitable vice presidential candidate for the 2023 elections. Meanwhile, Doyin Okupe, acknowledged that Labour Party cannot single-handedly defeat the Peoples Democratic Party and the All Progressives Congress.

The couples have four weeks to decide whether they want to move forward in their relationships by getting engaged, or if they should part ways.

item.title: Governors considering lockdown for counties experiencing surge in COVID-19 cases
item.description: - Of the total 11, 252 cases of COVID-19 confirmed in Kenya since March, Nairobi continues to lead with 6,245 followed by Mombasa (1,768), Kiambu (602), Busia (502) and Kajiado (526) - Council of Governors (COG) chairman Wycliffe Oparanya said county bosses were taking all the necessary measures to curb the spread of the highly contagious disease - While opening the country, President Uhuru Kenyatta said it was upon everyone to take care of themselves

item.title: INEC Fixes April 25 For Re-Run Election In Imo State
item.description: As a result of the alleged electoral irregularities reportedly experienced in the Imo State governorship and state house of assembly elections of last Saturday, April 11, the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has fixed a new date for the re-run elections in the state. This was made known to NAN on Wednesday in Owerri by the state’s Resident Electoral Commissioner, Dr Gabriel Ada. READ ALSO: INEC Officials Seek Support From Traditional Rulers

item.title: Nelson Havi suspended ahead of vote to decide his fate as LSK president
item.description: Nelson Havi has been suspended by the Council of the Law Society of Kenya, accusing him of failing as a leader. In a decision made on Monday, February 8, eight Council members said they had lost confidence in the leadership of the LSK president. They decided to suspend him pending the next Annual General Meeting, at which members will decide whether to remove or retain him. “In the interim, having lost confidence in him: no scintilla of confidence remaining, we acted to conserve the best interest of the members, the rule of law, public interest and the reputation of the society,” the council said.

item.title: NBC Suspends, Fines Channels Television [See Details]
item.description: The National Broadcasting Commission (NBC) has suspended Channels Television with a fine of N5 million for breaching the broadcast code. Naija News reports that this was made known in a letter to the Managing Director of Channels Television, signed by the Acting Director-General of the NBC, Prof. Armstrong Idachaba. NBC referred to Channels 7 pm live broadcast programme of Sunday, April 25, 2021, as a reason for its suspension. It accused the TV station of allowing a leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) to make secessionist and inciting declarations on air without being cautioned or reprimanded by the station.

item.title: NECA DG Timothy Olawale Is Dead
item.description: The Director-General of the Nigeria Employers Consultative Association (NECA), Timothy Olawale, has died. It was gathered that the NECA DG gave of the ghost in an undisclosed hospital on Friday. His death was confirmed in a statement on Saturday by the NECA Secretariat. “It is with the deepest sadness that we announce the passing of Dr Timothy Olawale, our Director-General, which occurred on Oct. 1 2021, at a hospital in Abuja,” the statement reads.

item.title: Will Thanos Die in 'Avengers: Endgame'?
item.description: Will Thanos Die in 'Avengers: Endgame'?By Mustafa GatollariUpdated April 11 2019, 4:56 p.m. ET (Warning: if you haven't seen Infinity War and hate having things spoiled, you should probably go and check it out on Netflix right now). Fans who went into Avengers: Infinity War without reading the comics really didn't know what to expect when they entered the theater. Watching all of your favorite heroes that you've become attached to over the years disintegrate before your very eyes was a huge mindf--k, there's just no other way to put it.

item.description: Nigerian professional footballer and Super Eagles captain, Ahmed Musa, has opened up on why withdrew himself from Kano Pillars to join the Turkish professional club, Fatih Karagumruk. Naija News reports that Musa signed a short-term deal with Nigeria Professional Football League (NPFL) side, Kano Pillars in April 2021. Musa had said that he returned to Pillars to contribute his own quota up to the end of the 2020/21 NPFL season.

item.title: Teacher Inspires Students With Stress-Free Weekend Assignment
item.description: Everyone Wants This Guy As Their Teacher After Seeing His Weekend AssignmentBy Aimee LutkinUpdated Oct. 22 2018, 4:00 p.m. ET Source: iStockRemember being a kid and having insane amounts of homework every weekend that you basically ignored until Sunday night, when you would completely meltdown? item.title: Price Of 'Pure Water' Skyrockets By 100% In Abia, Residents Drink From Boreholes, Other Public Sourc
item.description: The price of sachet water, popularly known as pure water, has reportedly increased by 100% per cent in Abia State, causing outrage among residents of Umuahia and other parts of the state. Naija News learnt that the price of sachet water has increased to N50 per one against two sachets for N50, which was sold barely two weeks ago. Also, a bag containing 20 sachets now costs between N400 and N450, compared to the N300 it was sold for by the retailers.

Ninety-five percent of people picture a Croc. I know, science is wild! (Just kidding.) Unfortunately, fashion goes in cycles and right now we're in a cycle that's embracing low-rise jeans and velvet chokers again.

item.title: Bobrisky To Reveal Identity Of Boyfriend Over One Condition
item.description: Nigerian crossdresser, Bobrisky has given his fans on social media a condition to reveal the identity of his boyfriend. The Snapchat sensation took to his Instagram page on Friday morning to announce that he needs 5000 yes on his post to reveal the identity of his secret manfriend. “5000 Yes !!! I will post my boyfriend tonight,” Bobrisky wrote. Meanwhile, Bobrisky had in a post earlier revealed his plans to buy Rolex car for his boyfriend.

item.title: Chelsea Appoint Thomas Tuchel As New Manager
item.description: Chelsea FC has confirmed the appointment of Thomas Tuchel as new manager to replace the sacked Frank Lampard. Naija News reports that Lampard was sacked on Monday leaving the London club 9th on the English Premier League table. Chelsea in a statement on its website said Tuchel has signed an 18-month contract with the possibility of an extension. Tuchel said: ‘I would like to thank Chelsea FC for their confidence in me and my staff.

item.title: Mary Cassatt - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Impressionist artist best known for "The Child's Bath," "Maternite," "Two Women Throwing Flowers During Carnival," and other motherhood-themed paintings. Before Fame She traveled widely in Europe as a child and lived in France during the early years of her adulthood. She enrolled in a painting class taught by the famed Charles Joseph Chaplin in 1866. Her first painting to be chosen by the Paris Salon was "A Mandoline Player" in 1868.

item.title: Reactions As Gov Makinde Donates Jeeps To Oyo PDP Leaders
item.description: Governor Seyi Makinde of Oyo State has donated two Land Cruiser Prado jeeps to the immediate past Chairman of Oyo State Peoples Democratic Party, Kunmi Mustapha, and the newly elected Chairman of the party in the state, Dayo Ogungbenro. The presentation of the cars was done on Monday (today) at the State Government House in Agodi, Ibadan, Naija News understands. Confirming the event, the publicity secretary of the party, Akeem Olatunji, in a post on his social media said the party leaders received the reward for their loyalty.

item.title: Actor Sam Trammell Talks Possible 'True Blood' Reunion or Reboot (EXCLUSIVE)
Bobby Sands - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Irish Republican Army revolutionary whose death at age 27 in the HM Prison Maze caused a surge of IRA activity and recruitment. Before Fame He joined the IRA in 1972, and was soon afterwards arrested for possessing four handguns. After being convicted, he served three years of a five-year sentence. Trivia He died of self-inflicted starvation on day 66 of his hunger strike, which he led to remove Special Category Status from IRA prisoners.

item.title: Marie Osmond - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Pop entertainer who hosted a variety show called The Osmonds with her brother Donny. Before Fame At age three, she made a guest appearance on The Andy Williams Show. Trivia She was half of Donnie & Marie, a singing and dancing family act. Family Life She got married to Steve Craig on June 26, 1982 then to Brian Blosil on October 28, 1986. After her second divorce, she remarried her former husband Steve on May 4, 2011.

item.title: Rhea Durham - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Fashion model who has appeared on the covers of Elle, Vogue and Marie Claire.  Before Fame She grew up in Florida, where she was scouted to become a model in her teens. Trivia She appeared in an episode of Spin City, playing the role of herself as a fashion model. Family Life She married Mark Wahlberg in 2009 after eight years of dating. She and Mark have two daughters, Ella and Grace, and two sons, Brendan and Michael.

item.title: Sakina Jaffrey - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Best known for her role as Linda Vasquez in Netflix's House of Cards, she would also land recurring roles in Third Watch and Sleepy Hollow. Her film credits include Definitely, Maybe, Raising Helen, The Domino Effect and A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood. Before Fame She studied Mandarin Chinese at Vassar College with the intention of being a translator before opting for acting. Trivia She and the House of Cards ensemble were nominated for a Screen Actors Guild Awards for Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series in 2015.

item.title: Alex Van Halen - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Founding member and drummer of the rock band Van Halen. He formed the band in 1974 with his brother Eddie, Michael Anthony, and David Lee Roth. Before Fame His first band, The Broken Combs, assembled when he was in fourth grade. He later attended Pasadena City College. Trivia He has stated that drummer Buddy Rich made a lifelong impact on his pursuit of music.  Family Life His brother, Eddie Van Halen, was another founding member and the lead guitarist of their band.

item.title: Police Begin Demolition Of Lagos POWA Complex
item.description: The Nigeria Police Force (NPF) initiated the planned demolition of the Police Officers’ Wives Association (POWA) shopping complex in the Ikeja area of Lagos. Naija News gathered that four excavators, accompanied by heavily armed police officers, arrived at the shopping complex around midnight. The police authorities stated that the planned demolition was carried out in good faith and for the benefit of all parties involved. The Force spokesperson, Olumuyiwa Adejobi, had previously explained that the demolition was necessary to make way for the immediate construction of a modern shopping complex on the same land.

item.title: Trish Stratus - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Former wrestler and TV personality who has won many WWE championships including the WWE Hardcore Championship. She was a three-time WWE Babe of the Year and was proclaimed Diva of the Decade. Before Fame She modeled for Fitness magazines. Trivia She was on the reality show Armed & Famous. In 2013, she was inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame. Family Life She married her high school sweetheart Ron Fisico in 2006.

item.title: April 26 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: While your career path may not be clear, know that your determination can translate to success in any field you choose. Your appreciation of beauty could lead you to a career as an art curator, graphic designer or artist. On the other hand, your social nature could lead you to a career in social work, teaching or counseling. Since you are driven by success, you may also excel in traditional careers, such as business, advertising or marketing.

item.title: Bola Tinubu Breaks Silence On His Health Status
item.description: Presidential aspirant on the platform of the All Progressives Congress, Bola Tinubu, on Friday clarified that he is not sick, adding that he has what it takes to lead Nigeria. The National Leader of the ruling APC stated this when he visited the palace of the Ataoja of Osogbo in Osun State. Tinubu further stated that he wants to serve Nigeria and has the quality to serve and make Nigeria great.

item.title: Josh and Christina Hall Are Part of One Big Blended Family on 'Christina in the Country'
item.description: Does Joshua Hall have kids on ‘Christina in the Country’? He’s a devoted husband to Christina Hall and he’s the step-father of her three children. Source: Instagram / @unbrokenjoshChristina Hall was once known only for being one half of HGTV's iconic Flip or Flop duo. And, while she's still known for her role in the former home renovation show, her personal life has interested fans more than ever in recent years.

item.title: The 9 Worst TV Dads From Sitcoms to Drama Over the Years
item.description: Father Knows Worst: Unraveling the Dysfunction of These Fictional TV DadsBy Chrissy BobicPublished June 16 2023, 2:19 p.m. ET Source: ShowtimeThere are certain fictional dads from television that you just love and wish you had grown up with, like the Phil Dunphy and Jack Pearsons of the world. But the worst TV dads are the ones who really make us stop and appreciate the parents we actually have, whether that includes a dad or not.

item.title: Youth Leader Gets Six Months Suspension Over Alleged Forgery
item.description: The leadership of the Labour Party(LP) has issued a six-month suspension against its National Youth Leader, Anslem Eragbe, following an alleged case of forgery for an illegal donation website. The party described the alleged forgery case by its national youth leader as an act of insubordination. The party replaced him a few hours after his suspension with Kennedy Ahanotu as the Acting National Youth Leader of the party. Naija News however gathered that Eragbe in his letter to President Muhammadu Buhari, the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission EFCC, trade union leaders and LP National Working Committee described his sanction as illegal.

item.title: 'Glass Onion' Introduces Fans to a New Mystery How Does It End? (SPOILERS)
item.description: The highly anticipated sequel to 'Knives Out' is finally here, and it boasts one shocking finale. Here's the 'Glass Onion' ending, explained. Source: NetflixSpoiler alert: This article contains major spoilers for Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery. After the first murder-mystery film received universal acclaim, filmmaker Rian Johnson decided to make Knives Out a franchise that follows fan-favorite Benoit Blanc (Daniel Craig) investigating further mysteries. Thankfully, the wait is over because the highly anticipated second installment, Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery, is here and ready to knock the socks off its audience.

item.title: Aspen Mansfield - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Instagram phenomenon who features herself by either taking mirror shots or selfies or having someone else capture the moment she finds herself in. Before Fame Growing up, she had trouble fitting in, with her brother being one of her only friends. Her first photo posted to her Instagram account dates back to December 22, 2012.  Trivia She has accumulated more than 1.7 million Instagram followers. Family Life Born in North Dakota, she later relocated to Destin, Florida.

item.title: Gunmen Storm Anambra Funeral Murder 20
item.description: About 20 persons have been killed and several injured during a burial in Ebenebe, Awka Anambra. The incident occurred on Saturday afternoon. An eyewitness alleged that the burial was for a member of a cult identified as Ozo. The assailants were reportedly cult members. They had raided the scene while the Ozo member was lying in his compound and had shot at the mourners. The source said: “My sister was supposed to be at the burial.

item.title: Mei Yu - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: YouTuber who runs a self-titled drawing channel, where she does cartoon tutorials, doodles, art lessons and Manga step-by-step. She has self-published several how-to-draw cartoons and anime books. Before Fame She is a self-taught artist from a young age, never attending special art classes until she got to high school and college. She had won 17 art awards and scholarships upon high school graduation. Trivia She has taught cartooning classes in schools and libraries.

item.title: What Happened to Aldon Smith? He Has Been Through It All
item.description: From the NFL to Sleeping in a Car to Jail and Now Helping Others, Aldon Smith Is Evolving“I’ve been blessed with the opportunity to grow as a person, developing a relationship with myself that continues to evolve," Aldon said. By Brandon CharlesMar. 12 2024, Published 10:42 a.m. ET Source: GettyWith each spring and the NFL Draft there’s a renewed interest in pro football could-have-beens. item.title: 'The Vanilla Ice Project' Has Been Going Strong for 9 Seasons on the DIY Network

item.title: Nigerian DSS ranks and salary structure explained: 2024 update
item.description: The Nigerian Department of State Services (DSS), headquartered in Abuja, is a security agency embedded in the National Security Organization (NSO). It was formed in 1986 and is tasked with ensuring national security, gathering intelligence, and protecting the Federal Republic of Nigeria against domestic threats. If you interested in serving your country in any capacity under this agency, here is an overview of Nigerian DSS ranks and salary structure. TABLE OF CONTENTSThe Department of State Services (DSS) operates under the Nigerian Presidency and communicates its actions to the office of the National Security Adviser (NSA), based in Abuja.

item.title: Nnamdi Kanu Will Be Released Soon
item.description: Mbazulike Amaechi, a first republic Minister of Aviation, has said that the leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra, IPOB, Nnamdi Kanu will be released soon. Amaechi stated this while addressing journalists in Onitsha, Anambra State, ahead of Kanu’s trial on Friday. Sometime last year, the former minister visited President Muhammadu Buhari alongside a delegation over the release of Kanu. However, he said that the activist was not released despites the president’s promise.

item.title: SERAP Asks Akpabio, Abbas To Cut N344.85 Billion NASS Budget
item.description: The Socio-Economic Rights and Accountability Project (SERAP) has called on Senate President Godswill Akpabio and Speaker of the House of Representatives Tajudeen Abbas to significantly reduce the National Assembly’s hefty budget of N344.85 billion. This appeal is made in light of the pressing economic challenges facing Nigeria. In a move advocating for fiscal responsibility and transparency, SERAP has urged the legislative leaders to request President Bola Tinubu to submit a revised supplementary appropriation bill reflecting the reduced budget for the National Assembly’s approval.

item.title: It Is Not Yorubas Turn To Be President Adebutu
item.description: The governorship candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in Ogun State, Ladi Adebutu, has said it is not the turn of the South West to produce the next President. He stated that the North-East should be allowed to produce President Muhammadu Buhari’s successor, adding that the region has never produced Nigeria’s leader before. Adebutu said former President Olusegun Obasanjo and interim Head of State Ernest Shonekan from the South-West region have been Nigerian leaders at separate times.
